mean_cn: n. 拍手者，铃舌，响板，唠唠叨叨的嘴巴
mean_en: a metal ball that hangs inside a bell and hits the inside of the bell to make it ring
word_etyma: clapp鼓掌 + er 名词后缀 → n. 拍手者；铃舌；响板；唠唠叨叨的嘴巴
short_phrase: The clappers stand and clap their hands.
sentence: The clappers stood to show their appreciation.
sentence_trans: 拍手者们站起来表示他们的感谢。
